section.p: The LIN Cluster parameters can be edited by Right clicking the LIN Cluster Element in Element View and click on pop up menu 'Edit'.A dialog Box as Shown in below image will be displayed.
1. Lin protocol and Language versions are read only sections.

body.section: 2. Baud rate of the Lin cluster can be defined in the LIN Baud rate Section.

section.p: 3. Channel Name can be provided in Channel Name section.This field is available from LDF2.1 version.
